meanings.definition: The quality or state of being shy or timid.
meanings.sent1: Her bashfulness prevented her from speaking up in class.
meanings.sent2: His bashfulness made it difficult for him to make new friends.
meanings.sent3: Despite her bashfulness, she managed to give a speech at the event.
meanings.sent4: The bashfulness of the kitten hiding behind the couch was endearing.
meanings.sent5: The bashfulness of the deer in the clearing was a sight to behold.

meanings.definition: A feeling of self-consciousness or awkwardness in social situations.
meanings.sent1: The bashfulness she felt at the party made her avoid eye contact.
meanings.sent2: His bashfulness was evident as he fidgeted nervously during the interview.
meanings.sent3: The bashfulness of the penguin waddling among the other animals was quite amusing.
meanings.sent4: Her bashfulness was like a heavy cloak weighing her down in the crowded room.
meanings.sent5: The bashfulness of the flower blooming in the shade was a delicate beauty.
